name: Connecticut Cheeseburger Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Take everything you love about a big, juicy burger - and turn it into a dip! This creamy, mouth-watering appetizer is flavored with McCormick® Brown Gravy Mix and loaded with ground beef, ketchup, mustard, onions, Cheddar, tomatoes, and pickles. (We weren't kidding when we said everything!) Bake until melty and serve with steak fries or breadsticks. It's game time.
ingredients: 1 (.87 ounce) package McCormick® Brown Gravy Mix
directions: Mix ground beef, onion, ketchup, mustard and Gravy Mix in large skillet until well blended
Cook and stir on medium-high heat until beef is no longer pink
Stir in cream cheese and 1/2 cup of the shredded cheese
Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup shredded cheese
Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until cheese is melted
